content: Perform all work carefully, guided by compassion
speaker: Ved Vyasa

content: The remedy for weakness is not brooding over weakness, but thinking of strength.
speaker: Swami Vivekananda

content: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
speaker: Florence Nightingale

content: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
speaker: Kevin Kruse

content: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
speaker: Buddha

content: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
speaker: Chinese Proverb

content: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
speaker: Jim Rohn

content: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing.  That’s why we recommend it daily.
speaker: Zig Ziglar

content: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
speaker: Aristotle

content: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
speaker: Confucius

content: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
speaker: Latin Proverb

content: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough we must apply. Being willing is not enough we must apply. Being willing is not enough
speaker: Leonardo da Vinci

content: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
speaker: Roger Staubach

content: You become what you believe.
speaker: Oprah Winfrey

content: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
speaker: Unknown

content: Education is the manifestation of perfection present already in man. Divinity is the manifestation of religion already in man.
speaker: Swami Vivekananda

content: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
speaker: Confucious

content: To other countries, I may go as a tourist, but to India, I come as a pilgrim.
speaker: Martin Luther King, Jr.

content: The tree laden with fruits always bends low. If you wish to be great, be lowly and meek.
speaker: Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa

content: We are what our thoughts have made us so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live, they travel far
speaker: Swami Vivekananda

content: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
speaker: Abdul Kalam

content: Do not say, ‘It is morning,’ and dismiss it with a name of yesterday. See it for the first time as a newborn child that has no name.
speaker: Rabindranath Tagore

content: Education is the manifestation of perfection already in a man.
speaker: Swami Vivekananda

content: Talk to yourself at least once in a Day… Otherwise you may miss a meeting with an EXCELLENT person in this World…
speaker: Swami Vivekananda

content: Every idea that strengthens you must be taken up and every thought that weakens you must be rejected.
speaker: Swami Vivekananda
